cs35013s.view

Class A_Descriptor<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>,_MAPPER_ extends A_Mapper<?,?>,_RENDERER_ extends A_Renderer<?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.I_WorldCoordinatable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs35013s.view.A_Descriptor<_DESCRIPTOR_,_MAPPER_,_RENDERER_,_AXIS_>
  • Type Parameters:
    _DESCRIPTOR_ - - the descriptor type
    _MAPPER_ - - the mapper type
    _RENDERER_ - - the renderer type
    _AXIS_ - - the axis type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    A_DescriptorHorizontal, DescriptorVertical

    public abstract class A_Descriptor<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>,_MAPPER_ extends A_Mapper<?,?>,_RENDERER_ extends A_Renderer<?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.I_WorldCoordinatable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the shared elements of a descriptor for an axis of a view in terms of the origin, size, gridline interval, and zoom step, as well as the appropriate mapper and renderer.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [02.04.13]

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private _AXIS_ _extent
      the extent of the world, which is centered on the origin
      protected _MAPPER_ _mapper
      the mapper
      private _AXIS_ _origin
      the origin in the world
      protected _RENDERER_ _renderer
      the renderer
      private _AXIS_ _step
      the zoom step
      private java.awt.Point _viewCenter
      the center of the view in pixels
      private java.awt.Dimension _viewSize
      the size in pixels of the view on which the world is rendered, which is always close to square
      protected static double MAX_ZOOM
      the maximum zoom level, as a decimal-encoded latitude

      • offset

        protected abstract _AXIS_ offset(_AXIS_ anchor,
            int offset,
            boolean isInverted)
        Calculates the world coordinate based on an anchor offset by a cursor position from the center of the view.
        Parameters:
        anchor - - the anchor
        offset - - the offset
        isInverted - - whether to inverse the offset
        Returns:
        the resulting world coordinate

      • zoom

        public abstract void zoom(cs35013s.datatype.CoordinateWorld3D anchor,
        int offset,
        boolean inOrOut,
        boolean isInverted)
        Zooms in or out from the current position.
        Parameters:
        anchor - - the world coordinate of the cursor
        offset - - the cursor offset from the view center
        inOrOut - - whether to zoom in
        isInverted - - whether the zoom axis is inverted
